verses.roman:
prasanno bhagavān kubjāṁ
trivakrāṁ rucirānanām
ṛjvīṁ kartuṁ manaś cakre
darśayan darśane phalam

synonyms: prasannaḥ—satisfied; bhagavān—the Supreme Lord; kubjām—the hunchback; trivakrā—Trivakrā; rucira—attractive; ānanām—whose face; ṛjvīm—straight; kartum—to make; manaḥ cakre—He decided; darśayan—showing; darśane—of seeing Him; phalam—the result.
translation: Lord Kṛṣṇa was pleased with Trivakrā, so He decided to straighten that hunchbacked girl with the lovely face just to demonstrate the result of seeing Him.
